changelog: Lots of changes to how logic is handled, and making it easier to update later.
Changing to how locations are named both interally and in the tracker.
Added connections data and logic (hopefully it is more accurate this time)
Preperation for being able to read slot_data from the ap world.
Difficulty can now be controlled locally(this needs work on the apworld side to be auto trackable) but has a button in the POPTracker (next to the trees)
Difficulties are: Casual -> Difficulty 0, Standard -> Difficulty 1, Expert -> Difficulty 2, Master -> Difficulty 3 and Glitched -> Difficulty 4
Logic and tracking of the v0.2.0 content for the Apworld and some changes to textures
